Class Generator

  • java.lang.Object
    • Generator

  • public class Generator
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates a solvable Sudoku puzzle. Note: Might generate puzzles with multiple solutions.
    Author:
    sjboris, alamana

      • initialize

        public void initialize(Cell[][] grid,
              java.util.ArrayList<Group> groups,
              int N)
        Used to set up the objects needed to create a puzzle.
        Parameters:
        grid - Array to initialize
        groups - List holding groups for the grid
        N - Number of cells on a side

      • getSolution

        public Cell[][] getSolution(int N)
        Meant to be called after generatePuzzle().
        Parameters:
        Number - of cells on a side
        Returns:
        A deep copy of completed puzzle

      • getPartial

        public Cell[][] getPartial(int N)
        Meant to be called after generatePuzzle().
        Parameters:
        Number - of cells on a side
        Returns:
        A deep copy of partially completed puzzle

      • generatePuzzle

        public void generatePuzzle(int N,
                  int difficulty)
        Initializes puzzle and solution. If the difficulty is 1, each row will have five filled in values. If the difficulty is 2, each row will have four filled in values. If the difficulty is 3, each row will have three filled in values.
        Parameters:
        N - Number of cells on a side of the board.
        difficulty - 1 is the easiest, 3 is the hardest
